channel.title: Administartor Commands?
channel.description:
I am new at this as you can see...
So, i need some admin commands like the codes to put in it like,
THE CODES FOR,
::kickall
::kick (user)
::ban (user)
::ipban (user)
::god
::godoff
AND THOSE ARE THE ONES I WANT SO FAR I MIGHT POST MORE IF I THINK OF MORE...

item.title: Administartor Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Just search ‘command.startswith’ in your client.java
Add it above/under one of those.

Read full topic

item.title: Administartor Commands?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

The General:

Where do you put that code, because I’m interested in using the “god” command. Also, you type in ::god ingame to activate the command right (I too am a noob)

We were all newbs at coding at one time
and yes to type ::god ingame to activate god mode and ::godoff to turn it off

and to answer your question where to add it
just find a command thats already made and add it underneath it

Read full topic

item.title: Administartor Commands?
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("kick"))
		{
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
                        sendMessage("You kicked "+command.substring(5));
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is kicking "+command.substring(5));;
                }
else if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2)
                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(7);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
			appendToBanned(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/cxz/Desktop/pimpscape beta/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1)
{
setAnimation(1500);
playerSE = 1501;
playerSEW = 1851;
playerSER = 1851;
playerSEA = 1851;
playerEnergy = 99999999;
playerLevel[3] = 99999999;
	sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
sendMessage("God mode on");
			updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){
sendMessage("god mode off");
playerSE = 0x328;
playerSEW = 0x333;
playerSER = 0x338;
playerSEA = 0x326;
playerEnergy = 100;
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
	sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149);
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

oh and where it says (new FileWriter(“C:/Documents and Settings/cxz/Desktop/pimpscape beta/logs/banlogs.txt”, true));
you gotta change it so it goes to your folder and into your ban logs

Read full topic
